Luis Palacios

MBA, Financial Planning and Data Analyst
St. Clair College . Ontario, Canada
Univ Andres Bello (UNAB). Chile
Univ Diego Portales (UDP). Chile

Biography

I am an experienced professional in Data Analysis roles within large and fast-paced corporations. Release-planning specialist trained in BI development, data analysis, and large experience in financial reporting. Recently graduated in Data Analytics for Business Postgraduate diploma at St. Clair College (ON, Canada) to complement my background

I have person with a natural passion for learning new data tools and processes.
Experienced in data analysis, data visualization and KPI/metrics visualization, with knowledge in Python, R, SQL, Tableau, Power BI, and large experience in QlikView and Qlik Sense.
Aside from that, knowledge of Oracle Hyperion Planning, HFM and SmartView tools for advanced reporting and pulling data.

I am an enthusiastic business partner and passionate about the highest quality of work and positive environments. Creative solutions architect with real-time problem-solving flexibility. Proven ability to learn quickly and adapt to new situations.

On this site I keep updated my resume, as well you can reach my LinkedIn.

Skills

  1. MS Excel / MS Access
    Performing data analysis, including PowerQuery. Ability to provide analysis and operational insights

  2. SQL
    Relational databases, data integration. Ensuring the integrity of the data

  3. Python
    Analyzing data to provide key insights and solve business challenges. Extract, integrate and analyze multiple disparate data sources from a variety of systems, such as structured and unstructured data.Mine data to uncover patterns and to identify business trends and new opportunities for using analytics

  4. R
    Explore data, apply statistics functions

  5. HFM
    Hyperion Financial Management. Consolidate and report financial results, meet global regulatory requirements, reduce the cost of compliance, and deliver confidence in the numbers

  6. Hyperion Planning
    Collection of data and financial consolidation. Data entry, analysis, and reporting, including personalizing data entry forms

  7. Smartview
    Experienced skills for reporting and querys. Design worksheets in Microsoft Excel to enter, format, analyze, and report on data

  8. Tableau
    Creating understandable visualizations of the extracted data and identifying patterns and insights from data analysis

  9. Power BI
    Including modeling with DAX, designing and mapping data models to shift raw data into meaningful insights, utilizing Power BI to build interactive and visually appealing dashboards and reports, and embedding Power BI content.

  10. QlikView | Qlik Sense
    Transforming large amounts of data in ways that are universally understandable or easy to interpret and spot patterns, trends and correlations. Build reports and dashboards with the help of Qlik and other reporting tools
